body:
I see why you are struggling so much now. Here, try [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6LP19pKH3DE) one (I'd watch everything, but if you want to get straight to the point, start from [third part](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Laycif-h67I)).

This tutorial will help you understand how to build a house from 2D plans fast and easy.

Don't forget to thumbs up the video, the guy does a great job, check his channel, he has other useful stuff.
